title: The Whole book of Psalms as they are now sung in the churches, with the singing notes of the time and tune set to every syllable, made plain and easie to the understandings of all that can read by the directions in the latter part of the preface, never before done in England.
author: May, Thomas, 1595-1650.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for R. Everingham for the Company of Stationers, and are to be sold by E. Brewster ... and S. Keeble ...,
